      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="nl">Animation gallery</string>
          </title>
          <language>nl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This site contains useful animations which can be embedded into science or geography lessons:  water cycle, ground water, earthquakes, seaquakes, monsoons, tides...</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ICT-eindtermen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">eQNet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Travelwell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">universal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Travel well</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">animation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">secondary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">primary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geography</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>4</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Site enthält nützliche Animationen, die in 
Wissenschaft oder Geographielektionen eingebettet werden können: 
wässern Sie Schleife, Grundwasser, Erdbeben, seaquakes, Monsune, 
Gezeiten...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site contient les animations utiles qui peuvent être 
incluses dans des leçons de la science ou de géographie : arrosez le
cycle, eaux souterraines, tremblements de terre, seaquakes, moussons, 
marées...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este local contem os animations úteis que podem ser 
encaixados em lições da ciência ou da geografia: molhe o ciclo, 
água à terra, terremotos, seaquakes, monsoons, marés...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo luogo contiene le animazioni utili che possono essere 
incluse nelle lezioni di geografia o di scienza: innaffi il ciclo, 
l'acqua sotterranea, i terremoti, i seaquakes, i monsoni, maree...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η περιοχή περιέχει τις χρήσιμες ζωτικότητες που μπορούν να 
ενσωματωθούν στα μαθήματα επιστήμης ή γεωγραφίας: κύκλος 
ύδατος, υπόγειο νερό, σεισμοί, υποβρύχιοι σεισμοί, μουσώνες, 
παλίρροιες...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este sitio contiene las animaciones útiles que se pueden 
embutir en lecciones de la ciencia o de la geografía: riegue el 
ciclo, agua subterránea, terremotos, seaquakes, monzones, mareas...</string>
          </description>
